"The Andromeda Strain" is a thrilling story about a team of scientists racing against time to uncover the mystery behind an alien contagion that has wiped out a town, starring actors like Paula Kelly and David Wayne.

Both movies offer captivating plots that will keep you engaged from start to finish!
